item.title: Trombone Champ: Unflattened
item.description:
Title: Trombone Champ: Unflattened
Genre: Casual
Developer: Flat2VR Studios , Holy Wow Studios
Publisher: Flat2VR Studios
Franchise: Trombone Champ
Release Date: Nov 26, 2024




About This Game

Trombone Champ: Unflattened , the BAFTA-nominated viral sensation, is back with a fully reimagined VR experience that’s all about letting you take center stage.

FIND YOUR GROOVE

Play the trombone your way—every note, every slide, every majestic honk is yours to control. You’re not just keeping up with the rhythm; you are the rhythm.

A ROAD PAVED IN BRASS

Toot your way through an all-new campaign packed with surprises, unlock fresh challenges, and climb the leaderboards on your way to glory.

HOARD OF HORNS

Amass a treasure trove of trombones, each one wilder than the last. With 20 unique designs at launch and plenty more on the horizon, there’s always another horn to hunt!

IF YOU PLAY YOUR CARDS RIGHT...

Build your ultimate deck with 50 Tromboner Cards packed with absurd trivia and legendary trombone lore.

Trombone Champ: Unflattened lets you wield your virtual trombone across over 50 tracks, spanning anthems, marches, classical bangers, and folk classics. Each piece is handcrafted to keep you honking and sliding to your heart’s content, with plenty of surprises and unlockables along the way to keep you coming back for more.

Using both hands—one to slide and the other to “toot” with style—you’ll control every pitch and tone as the music follows your lead. Stick to the melody for high scores, or embrace the freedom to play however you like, anytime. With its all-new campaign, and collectibles, Trombone Champ: Unflattened lets you take center stage and make every note your own.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 or higher
    • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 or higher
    • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC

item.title: New Arc Line
item.description:
Title: New Arc Line
Genre: RPG , Early Access
Developer: Dreamate
Publisher: Fulqrum Publishing
Franchise: Fulqrum
Release Date: Nov 26, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 26, 2024




About This Game

During Early Access, the game will only be available in English. More translations will be added later.

The New World looms on the horizon, on its shore the shining city of progress, and the last beacon of hope in your search for a cure to your family's fatal disease - New Arc. You arrive to this foreign land by steerage of a steamship, cramped with thousands of other immigrants, a stranger in a strange land, full of wonder. But you will soon discover that the city's beauty runs only skin-deep and all you find is rot beneath the golden facade.

Dark smoke from the factories chokes the skies, segregation, inequality, and corruption run rampant. You will have to rise from the very bottom, make tough decisions, and get your hands dirty if you are to succeed - and you must, no matter the cost!

Craft technopunk gear or master the arcane arts, fight, steal or smooth-talk your way to the top and become the hero or villain you want to be. You will not have to face the trials of this world alone, however; find your companions and gather your party, make foes and allies, fall in love, get involved in a massive conspiracy, and change the course of history forever.

Will you rise to the occasion?

Become the Hero or the Villain you want to be

Create your own character as a Human or Elf, choose your gender, background and appearance. Keep in mind that inhabitants of this world might have their own prejudices and will treat you differently depending on your choices.

Gather your Party

You won’t be alone on these shores. Meet & recruit a diverse cast of characters, learn their stories, face their demons together and help them grow, or use them for your own gain and discard them as fits your schemes. Who knows, maybe you will even find your true love!

Master Technology or Magic

Will you master the secrets of Magic to incinerate enemies as a Hellfire occultist, curse them with mystical Voodoo abilities, or assist your allies as a Celestial sage? Or will you rather cast aside the obsolete ways and become a Steampunk mechanic, Dieselpunk engineer or Teslapunk scientist, and turn your character into a walking steam-powered fortress?

Fight for your Right

Command your party in turn-based tactical battles. Fight head-on and brute-force your way through encounters or observe and analyze each situation and come up with cunning strategies to conquer even seemingly overwhelming odds. There’s a plethora of skills, spells, crafting recipes and consumables at your disposal to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Manifest Your Destiny

Make a name for yourself, influence countless lives for better or worse, and watch the consequences of your choices unfold. You may start out as only a poor immigrant, but soon your exploits will fill the front pages of newspapers and the events you set in motion will change the fate of the New World forever.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600K or AMD® Ryzen 5 1600X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 1660 6 GB VRAM or AMD® Radeon™ 5700 XT 6 GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12400 or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 5600X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 3060 or AMD® Radeon™ 6600 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 15 GB available space

item.title: House Flipper - Dine Out DLC
item.description:
Title: House Flipper - Dine Out DLC
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Frozen Way , Empyrean , GameFormatic S.A.
Publisher: Frozen Way , Frozen District , PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: Frozen Way , Frozen District , House Flipper
Release Date: Nov 26, 2024




About This Content

Dine Out DLC will let you get your foot in the door of the restaurant business. It comes with a set of engaging, immersive quests that will allow you to explore and renovate a variety of restaurants, cafes, sushi bars, wine cellars and pizzerias. The DLC also introduces numerous new items, mechanics and other features that will make your House Flipper experience more fun and comfortable.

Let them rent!

House Flipper has always enabled you to buy and sell properties, but now we're unlocking the opportunity for long-term profit making! Choose from residential properties, restaurants, cafes, or offices, and lease your freshly renovated spaces. The rental price depends on the number of rooms, furnishings and the type of property – choose a tenant that suits you and sign the contract.

Universal Cooker - One Click and Ready!

As with previous House Flipper DLCs, Dine Out comes with new tools to play with. One of them is the Universal Cooker – a multifunctional device that will let you spread your wings in the restaurant business both as a flipper and a chef. Have a taste for Thai cuisine? Or maybe you have a soft spot for some Italian classics? Pick and choose from our extensive list of diverse dishes and design the menu of your restaurant. Purchase the ingredients and wait as the magical Universal Cooker does its job! Dishes prepared with the Universal Cooker can be later used as delicious pieces of decor. And if you own our previous add-on (Farm DLC), you can get discounts on some of the dishes depending on the crops you have in your inventory.

More precision to stop collision!

A well-planned and decorated interior and elegant table setting are all factors when it comes to customer satisfaction. If you feel you might need a little help getting the establishment ready for a steady influx of demanding clientele, we recommend you take a look at our new grid measurement system. Buy in bulk and place items exactly where they need to be. The new tool that comes with Dine Out DLC allows you to keep everything as symmetrical as you'd like. Being a perfectionist has never been easier!

Cook up your own style

Make sure your establishment becomes an institution thanks to an iconic restaurant sign. Dine Out DLC comes with a tool that allows you to customize the logo of your restaurant with a plethora of shapes, fonts, colors and patterns. Mix it up, experiment, or keep it simple – there is no single recipe for success.

Key Features

  • 10 engaging and immersive quests

  • 10 houses to renovate and decorate

  • 30 dishes from around the world to prepare

  • Precise and symmetrical object placement on flat surfaces

  • The ability to rent out restaurants, offices and houses

  • The ability to design and build entresol to maximize space and add a touch of modern style.

  • The ability to decorate kitchen tables with tablecloths

  • The ability to design your own advertising and neon signs

  • Over 1350 new items!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

item.title: Critter Café
item.description:
Title: Critter Café
Genre: Casual , Simulation
Developer: Sumo Digital
Publisher: Secret Mode
Release Date: Nov 26, 2024




About This Game

Build your own cozy café, creating a welcoming space for townsfolk to meet and spend time with adorable critters who have joined your café!

Perfect latte art, deliver cakes, and serve coffee as your keen customers flock to spend time with critters at your café. Host critter-themed parties – movie nights, birthdays, and more!

As you explore the magical world of the Otherlands, discover and save 35 adorable critters! Discover Mogbert, Glowli and many more of the super cute creatures waiting to meet you!

Actively nurture your critters with love and care – you’re able to play with them, feed them a variety of treats, wash and brush them. Critters will bond with you as they join you in your café activities, developing new traits and unlocking cute new looks!

You have been receiving mysterious letters informing you of magical portals appearing around Gold Leaf Isle.

Explore several exciting locations and vibrant worlds. Traverse through portals to the Otherlands, navigate puzzles and find new critters which you will nurture and care for!

Express yourself! Customize your character with a wide range of looks, which you can change at any time.

Spend hours designing your café in detail with tables, chairs, sofas, wallpapers, flooring, wall decorations and much more.

After rescuing your critters, customize their habitat so they will thrive in their new home.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100 CPU @ 3.3 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 4100
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 380
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 CPU @ 2.8 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 10 GB available space

item.title: Gladio Mori
item.description:
Title: Gladio Mori
Genre: Action , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Plebeian Studio
Publisher: Bonus Stage Publishing , Korgi Digital (China)
Release Date: Nov 26, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 26, 2024




About This Game

Gladio Mori is a physics-driven fighting game that redefines the gladiator arena. Whether playing solo or challenging others in multiplayer battles, you’ll wield razor-sharp weapons and unleash unique moves in brutal, tactical combat. Every decision, swing, and step matters as you carve your path to victory.

Multiplayer

Take on opponents in intense online battles with up to 4 players or enjoy the action locally with split-screen gameplay. Prove your skill and adaptability in every fight as you rise to claim victory in the arena.

Organ-Based Damage System

Forget health bars—combat in Gladio Mori is as brutal as it is precise. Damage to muscles, arteries, and vitals directly impacts your ability to fight:

  • Injured Muscles weaken your strikes.

  • Severed Arteries cause you to bleed out.

  • Pierced Vitals mean instant death.

Precision and strategy are your greatest weapons.

Authentic Weapons and Armor

No magical gear here—just realistic weapons and armor that behave as they should. Plate armor blocks strikes, but exposes weak points. Find openings in your opponent’s defenses or risk being outmatched.

In-Game Move Editor

Unleash your creativity with a fully customizable move editor. Control your character’s physical body to craft unique animations:

  • Design efficient and devastating attacks.

  • Recreate iconic moves from your favorite films or games.

  • Experiment with wild, unpredictable maneuvers—it's up to you.

Community-Created Moves

Not an animator? No problem. Explore movesets shared by other players or mix and match individual moves to create a style that’s entirely yours. The community fuels the creativity in Gladio Mori.

Enter the Arena

Every battle in Gladio Mori is a test of strategy, skill, and ingenuity. Forge your fighting style, exploit weaknesses, and prove your worth in the ultimate arena.

The gladiator's path awaits—are you ready?

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game is fairly stylized, but it does include unrealistic but frequent violence.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 3.5GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
